Class Visit

java.lang.Object
common.Visit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Visit extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a customer's visit to the Bistro restaurant. Tracks table occupancy, timing, and billing status throughout the visit lifecycle.
See Also:

    Enumeration defining the possible lifecycle states of a restaurant visit.

  • Constructor Details

    • Visit

      public Visit(long confirmationCode, int tableId, int userId, long billId, String startTime, Visit.VisitStatus status)
      Full constructor to initialize all fields of a Visit entity. * @param confirmationCode Unique ID linked to the reservation.
      Parameters:
      tableId - ID of the assigned table.
      userId - ID of the customer.
      billId - ID of the generated bill.
      startTime - Timestamp of arrival.
      status - Initial lifecycle state of the visit.
